name: metrics_snaplv
description: Metrics snapshot for the snaplv tile

full_duplicate_accounts_hashed.description: Number of duplicate accounts hashed for the full snapshot during snapshot loading. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted

incremental_duplicate_accounts_hashed.description: Number of duplicate accounts hashed for the incremental snapshot during snapshot loading. Might decrease if snapshot load is aborted and restarted
